str2: In like manner, likewise, just so. From hos and an adverb from autos; as thus, i.e. In the same way.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From sun and antilambanomai; to take hold of opposite together, i.e. Co-operate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From asthenes; feebleness; by implication, malady; morally, frailty.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 1st Person Plural
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To intercede for, make petition for. From huper and entugchano; to intercede in behalf of.
A groaning, sighing. From stenazo; a sigh.
Unutterable, that baffles words, unexpressed. Unspeakable.
